text: Nicole Richie ’ s NOT giving her blessing to Sofia & Scott Disick. HL learned exclusively, she ’ s desperate for her sis to end it. For one, she thinks he ’ s ‘ way too old! ’ Turns out, Lionel Richie, 68, isn ’ t the only family member who ’ s not on board with Sofia Richie, 19, and Scott Disick ‘ s, 34, relationship. Sofia ’ s big sister, Nicole Richie, 36, is not a fan at all of their “ unhealthy ” romance, and she ’ s apparently been pleading with her sis to break up with the reality star — before things go too far.
